data.title: Literary Birthday Calendar
data.meta_description: Writers Write has created this literary birthday calendar for you. Find your favourite authors' birthdays on one page.
data.text:
Writers Write has created this fabulous literary birthday resource for you. Our literary birthday calendar lets readers and writers see the birth dates of thousands of authors on one page.

Once you find an author who interests you, click through and read more about them and their birthday.

We add to this literary birthday calendar on a regular basis.

The Writers Write Literary Birthday Calendar
